column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I know a lot of people that rave about this restaurant
column2: but it's nothing special to me.  The service I've had has always been terrible at best.  The food has been good
column3: particularly the potato and octopus tapas
column4: but nothing considerably amazing.  I do give a round of applause to the blackberry sangria
column5: which has helped make every meal of mine at Ba-Ba-Reeba a success.
